body_html: After upgrading to CUDNN6 and building PyTorch from source dilations are running quickly on the GPU. With CUDNN v5, dilation was extremely slow (as above) and actually slower than running code purely on the CPU. Not sure if that is still the case.
body_text: After upgrading to CUDNN6 and building PyTorch from source dilations are running quickly on the GPU. With CUDNN v5, dilation was extremely slow (as above) and actually slower than running code purely on the CPU. Not sure if that is still the case.
body: After upgrading to CUDNN6 and building PyTorch from source dilations are running quickly on the GPU. With CUDNN v5, dilation was extremely slow (as above) and actually slower than running code purely on the CPU. Not sure if that is still the case.
